Yasuo's windwall blocks things from underground, like Nautilus's ultimate and stops people from running, like Sion's ultimate.

Urgot cannot have 500 range because it would be game breaking. I'm not going to compare his kit to any of the others but I really want to.

Ryze's passive must be consecutively used instead of just stacking and staying stacked, until activated.

Veigar's ultimate cannot surpass 100% of his AP, when it use to just be 120% of his AP.

Lee Sin got health % damage on his ultimate.

Mordekaiser's change was a complete fail and they never reverted it.
